p: Over the past decade, the number of cancer deaths worldwide has been increasing. It is a significant cause of many of the health problems experienced by humans around the world. Cancer is followed by a range of cardiovascular diseases in terms of mortality rates. Notably, the leading cause of deaths attributed to cancer is lung cancer. Therefore, the antitumor activity of the three Clauseneae plant extracts in this study were investigated. The effect of the essential oil and methanol extracts of C. excavata, C. harmandiana and M. koenigii by varied concentrations (0–1 µg/mL) were observed for 24 and 48 h against human normal cells using human peripheral blood mononuclear cell (PBMC) and human lung cancer cell (A549).
